'''Vinagre''' is a [[Virtual Network Computing|VNC]] client for the [[GNOME]] [[desktop environment]]. It is slated for inclusion in GNOME 2.22.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=980&num=2|date=2008-01-29|title=Eight Interesting Improvements In GNOME 2.22|publisher=[[Phoronix]]|accessdate=2008-02-01}}</ref>. It will also be included into the default installation of [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] 8.04 (Hardy Heron) as its official VNC client.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardyHeron/Alpha4|title=HardyHeron/Alpha4|work=Ubuntu Wiki|accessdate=2008-02-01}}</ref>
'''Vinagre''' is a [[Virtual Network Computing|VNC]] client for the [[GNOME]] [[desktop environment]]. It is slated for inclusion in GNOME 2.22.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=980&num=2|date=2008-01-29|title=Eight Interesting Improvements In GNOME 2.22|publisher=[[Phoronix]]|accessdate=2008-02-01}}</ref>. It will also be included into the default installation of [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] 8.04 (Hardy Heron) as its official VNC client.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardyHeron/Alpha4|title=HardyHeron/Alpha4|work=Ubuntu Wiki|accessdate=2008-02-01}}</ref>
